stack.description:
This contains the Point Cloud Library (PCL), its 3rd party dependencies, and a ROS interface for PCL nodelets.
This is the "unstable" version, which tracks a specific revision of PCL trunk. Everything is moved into the pcl16 namespace, which makes it possible for this to coexist alongside the PCL released for Fuerte.
stack.author: Maintained by Radu Bogdan Rusu
